title: Kris Jenner is absolutely owning zebra-print bikini in iconic throwback
text:
They don’t get much more legendary than Kris Jenner, who is queen of the throwback this week.

Don’t even try to up the family at this game tomorrow – you’re not going to win.

Thanks to Kim Kardashian, we were blessed with an insight into 80s Kris as she was seen rocking a zebra-print bikini and our lives are all the more rich for it.

Taking to Instagram, Kim shared a shot of Kris, 63, posing alongside a pal in her swimmers, loving life and with an expression of absolute joy on her face.

‘I mean… who is hotter than my mom after giving birth to brother! @krisjenner @fayeresnick,’Kim wrote in the caption for the iconic image.

Kris has still got it (Picture: ACAU / BACKGRID)

To be fair, all of the Kardashian family have essentially morphed back into their pre-baby bodies pretty easily.

Must be their natural metabolism. Or the personal trainers, time dedicated to working out, personal chefs whipping up healthy meals, money, personal trainers. Oh, and don’t forget the money.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Still, obviously everyone was going wild for the image, as they took to the comments section with many a fire emoji.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Because Kris, quite frankly, is fire.

The throwback is no I Love My Friends – you know that spectacular song Kris recorded in the 80s as a tribute to her girl gang – but it’s a start.

We’re not sure if Kim is feeling super nostalgic recently, but the mogul has been living for the throwbacks as of late.

Another walk down memory lane (Picture: @kimkardashian)

On Sunday, alongside her older sister Kourtney, the ultra-glam TV personalities posted vintage snaps from their teenage years to Instagram, harking back to a time when fashions were different. Very different.

Over on Kourtney’s Instagram, the oldest Kardashian sibling shared an incredible photo of herself and her sibling on a family ski trip and everything about it screams ‘pre-millenium’.

Wearing her hair in a pink bandana (very X-Tina), the then 17-year-old Kourtney practices her smize for the camera while 16-year-old Kim sports an oversized hoodie that surely has to be the inspirations for Kanye’s Yeezy collection.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Representing their status through rabbit emojis, Kourtney simply captioned the post: ‘Circa 1996’.

Opting to show off the girls in their most glamourous party couture instead, Kim’s photograph featured a fam holiday to Armenia in their teens, with Kourtney wearing a light blue plunging tshirt and Kim going for a white strapless dress.

What a time to be alive.

MORE: James Blunt says he will ‘never be cool’ and same
description: Kris Jenner is Kardashian matriarch for a reason as she owns zebra-print bikini in iconic throwback.
